html:
4.26.20  3:10 pm   4.25.20  10:34 am   thing is, you will get significantly fewer things done if you insist on doing every aspect of them yourself


embedded answer: https://billwurtz.com/questions/q.php?date=202004251034

4.25.20  10:34 am   any movie ideas or TV show pitches?

      i prefer not to pitch. would rather make the thing myself. too painful to send an idea out there and have it rejected before it can even be properly made, and then even if it is accepted it still might not get properly made
original_html: 4.26.20  3:10 pm   4.25.20  10:34 am   thing is, you will get significantly fewer things done if you insist on doing every aspect of them yourself
